description.ko: 수학적 정밀함과 디지털 혼돈의 정교한 융합. KURO-X 지오메트릭 글리치는 날카로운 건축적 라인과 생동감 넘치는 파편화된 빛의 패턴을 통해 시스템 오류의 미학을 탐구합니다.
description.en: A sophisticated fusion of mathematical precision and digital chaos. KURO-X Geometric Glitch explores the beauty of system errors through sharp architectural lines and vibrant, fragmented light patterns.

prompt: Cinematic 8k close-up of KURO-X branding integrated into a complex geometric glitch environment. Sharp vector polygons, digital artifacts, and chromatic aberration. Deep onyx surfaces with electric cyan and magenta neon accents. High-tech futuristic aesthetic, fragmented shapes, volumetric lighting, hyper-realistic textures.
